message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You're starting high, let's see if you'll go lower!
I'll meet you in the middle, but not that low!
You're not budging, I'll take a bigger share!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
You're still too high, I'll take more this time!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to hold out!
You're running out of time, I'll take the majority!
I'm almost out of time, but I'll try to squeeze out a better deal!
You're getting close to nothing, I'll take the rest!
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to salvage something!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take the majority!
